chapter.title: Next Steps
chapter.para: In this section you validate the model and deploy the cloud.

section.title: Validate the Model and Deploy the Cloud

procedure.title: Validate Cloud Configuration and Deploy the Cloud

step.para: On the seventh screen (Review Configuration Files) click Validate. You should get a successful validation

To deploy the cloud from this configuration, click Deploy. You can click on the Show Log link in the bottom left corner of the SUSE OpenStack Cloud Deployer screen to see the progress of the cloud deployment.
On the eighth screen (Cloud Deployment In Progress), when the cloud deployment is finished successfully, click Next.

On the final screen you should see Cloud deployment successful. This final screen should also include links to useful tools including OpenStack Horizon UI, the CLM Admin Console and the SUSE Documentation.
